EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - New Tricentis Professional Program - 2014.11.21.Email - Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: New Tricentis Professional Program – Available Jan 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: New Tricentis Professional Program – Available Jan 2015
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Tricentis is launching a new Professional Training Program in January 2015. Register for our webinar now and join our head of training, Xaver Benz, as he runs through the ins and outs of our new blended learning modules and how this will impact your older Tricentis certifications.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
For more information about the Professional Training Program and Pre-registration availaibilities. Please contact the training team here <mailto:training@tricentis.com>. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-new-tricentis-professional-program-2011.11.21.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-new-tricentis-professional-program-2011.11.21.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Fri Nov 21, 2014 3:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. CET 9:00 a.m. – 10:00 a.m. EST Thu Nov 27, 2014 12:30 p.m. – 1:30 p.m. CET 6:30 a.m. – 7:30 a.m. EST
Xaver Benz Head of Tricentis Training Tricentis
